isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - AIR INTAKES

svcsubproc.title: 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 57 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove 10 screws (Item 1) attaching cab air intake scoop (Item 2) to cab and remove air intake scoop with air intake screen (Item 3) from the side of the cab.
Clean debris from the air intake screen and inspect for tears or holes. Replace screen if necessary.

svcsubproc.title: 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 57 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Position cleaned, or new, air intake screen (Item 3) into air intake scoop (Item 2).
Position air intake scoop with the air intake screen on the side of the cab and install 10 screws (Item 1).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 58for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.

Remove the hood deflector bracket (Item 1) by removing 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 6) from inside the left hood side panel (Item 2). Remove the hood air intake deflector (Item 5) from outside the left hood side panel.
Remove 6 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 3) from the back side of the air intake deflector (Item 5) to remove the air intake screen (Item 4).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 58for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Assemble the air intake screen (Item 4) on the back side of the air intake deflector (Item 5) and 6 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 3).

Position the hood air intake deflector and air intake screen on the outside of the left hood side panel (Item 2), then position the hood deflector bracket (Item 1) inside the left hood side panel and secure it to the hood air intake deflector with 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 6).
Close and latch the hood assembly on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on the driver side of the hood and raise the hood.

Remove the hood deflector bracket (Item 2) by removing 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 1) from inside the left hood side panel (Item 3) and remove the hood air intake deflector (Item 5) from outside the left hood side panel.
Remove 6 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 6) from the back side of the air intake deflector to remove the air intake screen (Item 4).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Assemble the air intake screen (Item 4) on the back side of the air intake deflector (Item 5) with 6 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 6).

Position the hood air intake deflector with air intake screen (Items 5 and 4) on the outside of the left hood side panel (Item 3), then position the hood deflector bracket (Item 2) inside the left hood side panel and secure it to the hood air intake deflector with 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 1).
Close and latch the hood assembly on both sides.

figure.caption: Figure 59. 5000 SBA (With Butterfly Hood) Air Intake

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. PAN HEAD SCREW AND FLAT WASHER
